metadata.title: CVE-2021-26712 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Incorrect access controls in res_srtp.c in Sangoma Asterisk 13.38.1, 16.16.0, 17.9.1, and 18.2.0 and Certified Asterisk 16.8-cert5 allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to prematurely terminate secure calls by replaying SRTP packets.

criterions.comment: asterisk package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
